column5: Come stay in the hip, East Austin hills of AGAVE`. Beautiful, quiet neighborhood filled with Modern Architecture and unique houses exploding with color! Only 10 minutes from the airport, and 7 miles to Downtown Austin... roughly a $15 taxi ride... You'll be in the right spot to reach all of Austin! This 2008 house is a 3 bedroom / 3 bath with FANTASTIC VIEWS! Feel welcome to contact me about any questions! We would love to host you in the amazing East Austin!
